name: cv
description: This repo generates my CV into HTML and PDF.

scripts.demo: npm run build && light-server --serve dist --open --delay 100 --watchexp "src/** # npm run build # reload"
scripts.demo:pdf: npm run build && light-server --serve dist --open --delay 100 --watchexp "src/** # npm run build:pdf # reload"
